name: Flowers which Bloom in Winter
description:
[DEMO] [Currently in development and subject to change.]

Synopsis: 
Rue, a prince of a snowy land, had set out from the capital incognito in search of a bride. However, on his journey, he was attacked by bandits! He wakes up in a remote village, at the care of a quiet apothecary and carefree hunter. He wishes to learn more about the two but a certain mystery of their bond seems to be keeping him from getting anywhere close. Will Rue find his princess here?

Demo is about 10 minutes of playtime. (Possibly less.)
